name: Cyber Link Dragoon Lord
text:
2+ or more Omni monsters with different names
This card can only be Link Summoned by using the above materials. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card from your hand; target 1 monster on the field or in either playerâ€™s GY(s); banish it. If a monster is banished by this effect: This card gains ATK equal to the banished monster's original ATK until the end of the turn. If a Spell/Trap Card is banished: destroy 1 card your opponent controls. Once per turn, if this card is Link Summoned; you can add 1 Omni monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if it is Level 6 or lower: You can Special Summon it. When an effect that would destroy a card on the field is activated (Quick Effect): You can tribute 1 Omni monster from your field or hand to negate the activation. If you do, destroy that card and inflict 1000 points of damage to your opponent. (Once per turn): During your Main Phase, you can banish 1 Omni monster from your GY; this card gains ATK equal to the banished monster's original ATK until the end of the turn. You can also target 1 card your opponent controls and return it to the hand. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can Special Summon 1 Omni monster from your GY. That monster gains 1500 ATK, and you can equip "Cyber Link Dragoon Lord" to it as material.
